Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
To run OpenCms you need

  • a Java SE Development Kit (JDK)
  • a database management system (DBMS)
  • a servlet container
  • and for server installation a front-end web server (e.g., Apache)

Here we give an overview of versions of these software components on which OpenCms 9.5 has been tested.

That does not mean that you are tied to these versions, but they are recommended.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Get an overview on the software components OpenCms 9.5 is tested with.
